001A4959.VoiceDir5.AA9BD: softly, having to accept a hard truth

2B055CAE.Line7.AA9BD: I have to find him. I have to bring my brother to justice.

9110E32C.Line5.AA9BD: I didn't want to believe it...but I've seen those scars before, on unsavory types who sometimes met with Perithan. It seems he's truly fallen in with them.
